summary: Provides the command‑line interface for the Agenta platform, exposing sub‑commands to initialise projects, manage application variants, run evaluations, configure endpoints, display version information and handle update notifications. Includes utilities for loading and persisting configuration, API key handling, telemetry collection, and communication with the Agenta backend service.
business_intent: Allow developers and operators to control and automate Agenta platform resources (projects, variants, evaluations) from the terminal, simplifying deployment, testing and monitoring while gathering usage analytics.
